destinations.name: Faroe Islands
destinations.description: Dramatic cliffs, colorful villages, and untouched landscapes in the North Atlantic. A paradise for photographers and nature lovers with stunning fjords and grass-roofed houses.
travel_tips: Weather changes rapidly - pack layers
Book ferries between islands in advance
Respect local nature and private property
Best views require hiking - bring good boots

destinations.name: Socotra Island
destinations.description: Yemen's alien-like island with dragon blood trees and unique biodiversity. Often called the 'Galápagos of the Indian Ocean' with 37% endemic plant species.
travel_tips: Requires special permits and guided tours
Limited infrastructure - plan accordingly
Bring cash - no ATMs on island
Respect the unique ecosystem

destinations.name: Matera
destinations.description: Ancient cave city in southern Italy with 9,000 years of history. Features Sassi districts with rock-hewn dwellings, churches carved into limestone, and atmospheric alleyways.
travel_tips: Stay in a cave hotel for unique experience
Wear comfortable shoes for steep streets
Visit early morning or late evening for best light
Explore both Sasso Caveoso and Sasso Barisano

destinations.name: Zhangjiajie National Forest Park
destinations.description: Towering sandstone pillars that inspired Avatar's Hallelujah Mountains. Features glass bridges, cable cars, and some of China's most dramatic landscapes.
travel_tips: Visit on weekdays to avoid crowds
Allow 2-3 days to explore fully
Wear non-slip shoes for glass bridge
Book cable car tickets online in advance

destinations.name: Lofoten Islands
destinations.description: Arctic archipelago in Norway with dramatic peaks, fishing villages, and Northern Lights. Combines stunning nature with rich Viking heritage and world-class hiking.
travel_tips: Rent a car for maximum flexibility
Book accommodation well in advance
Prepare for changeable weather year-round
Visit fishing villages like Reine and Nusfjord

destinations.name: Cappadocia
destinations.description: Otherworldly landscape of fairy chimneys and ancient underground cities. Famous for hot air balloon rides at sunrise and cave hotels carved into volcanic rock.
travel_tips: Book hot air balloon ride months in advance
Stay in a cave hotel in Göreme
Explore underground cities of Derinkuyu or Kaymakli
Rent ATV for independent valley exploration

destinations.name: Luang Prabang
destinations.description: Serene UNESCO town in Laos where monks collect alms at dawn. Features golden temples, French colonial architecture, and stunning Kuang Si Falls nearby.
travel_tips: Wake early for alms-giving ceremony (dress modestly)
Visit Kuang Si Falls for swimming
Explore night market for handicrafts
Rent bicycle to see countryside temples

destinations.name: Petra
destinations.description: Ancient Nabataean city carved into rose-red cliffs. Walk through the narrow Siq canyon to reveal the iconic Treasury, then explore tombs, temples, and amphitheaters.
travel_tips: Start early to beat crowds and heat
Wear comfortable hiking shoes
Bring plenty of water and snacks
Hike to Monastery for fewer crowds and great views

destinations.name: Bagan
destinations.description: Archaeological zone with over 2,000 Buddhist temples spread across ancient plains. Watch sunrise over pagodas from a hot air balloon for an unforgettable experience.
travel_tips: Rent e-bike to explore temples independently
Book hot air balloon months ahead
Visit lesser-known temples for solitude
Respect sacred sites - remove shoes at temples

destinations.name: El Nido
destinations.description: Paradise archipelago with limestone karsts, secret lagoons, and pristine beaches. Island hopping reveals hidden beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant coral reefs.
travel_tips: Book island hopping tours (Tour A, B, C, or D)
Bring underwater camera for snorkeling
Visit Secret Lagoon and Big Lagoon
Stay in Corong-Corong for quieter experience

destinations.name: Atacama Desert
destinations.description: Driest desert on Earth with lunar landscapes, salt flats, geysers, and flamingo lagoons. Offers world-class stargazing from high-altitude observatories.
travel_tips: Acclimatize to altitude before strenuous activities
Book stargazing tour for incredible night skies
Visit Valley of the Moon for sunset
Bring layers - temperature varies drastically

destinations.name: Bhutan
destinations.description: Himalayan kingdom measuring Gross National Happiness. Features Tiger's Nest Monastery, fortress dzongs, and pristine mountain landscapes with sustainable tourism.
travel_tips: Tourism is regulated - book through licensed operator
Daily fee includes guide, accommodation, meals
Hike to Tiger's Nest (Taktsang Monastery)
Visit during festival (Tshechu) for cultural experience

destinations.name: Valparaíso
destinations.description: Colorful port city built on 42 hills with bohemian culture, street art, and historic funiculars. Features vibrant neighborhoods, ocean views, and artistic atmosphere.
travel_tips: Ride historic funiculars (ascensores) up hills
Explore street art in Cerro Concepción and Cerro Alegre
Visit Pablo Neruda's house (La Sebastiana)
Stay in a boutique hotel with ocean views

destinations.name: Zanzibar
destinations.description: Spice Island with white sand beaches, historic Stone Town, and rich Swahili culture. Offers diving, spice tours, and sunset dhow cruises.
travel_tips: Explore Stone Town's narrow alleys and markets
Take spice tour to learn island's history
Visit Jozani Forest for red colobus monkeys
Beach-hop: Nungwi, Kendwa, Paje for kitesurfing

destinations.name: Tbilisi
destinations.description: Charming Georgian capital with eclectic architecture, sulfur baths, and vibrant food scene. Blend of medieval churches, Soviet brutalism, and modern glass bridges.
travel_tips: Try traditional sulfur baths in Abanotubani
Walk through Old Town to Narikala Fortress
Sample Georgian wine and khachapuri
Take cable car for panoramic city views

destinations.name: Patagonia
destinations.description: Vast wilderness at South America's edge with glaciers, mountains, and pristine lakes. Trek the W Circuit, see Perito Moreno Glacier, and spot guanacos and condors.
travel_tips: Book Torres del Paine campsites months ahead
Bring quality hiking gear and layers
Visit Perito Moreno Glacier in Argentina
Allow time for weather delays

destinations.name: Bukhara
destinations.description: Silk Road city with over 140 architectural monuments. Features stunning madrasahs, mosques with intricate tilework, and ancient trading domes.
travel_tips: Stay in traditional B&B for authentic experience
Visit Ark Fortress and Bolo Hauz Mosque
Explore trading domes for handicrafts
Try plov (pilaf) at local restaurant

destinations.name: Railay Beach
destinations.description: Stunning peninsula accessible only by boat with limestone cliffs, caves, and beaches. World-renowned rock climbing destination with laid-back beach vibes.
travel_tips: Try rock climbing - routes for all levels
Visit Phra Nang Cave Beach at sunset
Hike to Railay Viewpoint for panoramic views
Book longtail boat to nearby islands

destinations.name: Porto
destinations.description: Historic Portuguese city famous for port wine, colorful riverside buildings, and azulejo tiles. Features Douro Valley wine region and charming riverside cafes.
travel_tips: Visit port wine cellars in Vila Nova de Gaia
Walk across Dom Luís I Bridge
Explore Livraria Lello bookstore
Take day trip to Douro Valley for wine tasting

destinations.name: Sarajevo
destinations.description: Resilient city where East meets West with Ottoman bazaars, Austro-Hungarian architecture, and recent history. Rich coffee culture and warm hospitality.
travel_tips: Visit Baščaršija (Old Bazaar) for traditional crafts
Take free walking tour to understand history
Try Bosnian coffee and ćevapi
Visit Tunnel of Hope museum
